headline: Tesla Stock Is Up Again. This Matters More Than Cars.
summary: Tesla  stock rose early Monday.  The move comes after Friday’s 3.6% gain, catalyzed by Tesla’s 2025 proxy statement that outlined a new pay package for Musk worth roughly $1 trillion if all performance incentives were met.  Tesla would also need to deliver 20 million vehicles, achieve 10 million active Full Self-Driving, or FSD, subscriptions, deliver one million Optimus humanoid robots, and have one million robo-taxis in commercial operation.
